about_the_game:
Sloppy Forgeries is a fast-paced competitive painting game. Each round players race to copy a famous painting from art history as quickly and accurately as possible using their mouse and a few simple paint tools.

Accuracy is calculated by a pixel-by-pixel comparison of your painted reproduction and the original. Incorrect pixels are visualized upon completion.

Strategically use your assist tools to refine your masterpiece while you paint. These tools include a time-limited grid overlay:

...and three time-limited reference pins, which you can drag on to your canvas or the masterpiece. When placed, a second pin appears on the other painting in the same location, making it easier to see what goes where.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must have an external mouse.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must have an external mouse.
